COAH API¶

Sencast uses the COAH API to query the image database in order to identify suitable images and also to download images.

Documentation for COAH API can be found here.

externalapis.coah_api.do_download(auth, download_request, product_path, server)¶
externalapis.coah_api.download(auth, uuid, filename)¶
externalapis.coah_api.get_dataset_id(sensor, resolution)¶
externalapis.coah_api.get_download_requests(auth, start, end, sensor, resolution, wkt)¶
externalapis.coah_api.prepend_ns(s)¶
externalapis.coah_api.prepend_os(s)¶
externalapis.coah_api.search(auth, query)¶
externalapis.coah_api.timeliness_filter(uuids, product_names, timelinesss, beginpositions, endpositions)¶
